event.title: End of the Year celebration FSFE Berlin, Berlin Germany

body.p: We had a great year of activities with the Berlin supporter group of the FSFE. Lets celebrate the year!
The celebration will take place at the usual meeting spot of the Berlin group - the Kieztreff Undine starting at 18h. We will celebrate together with the LUG LinuxWorks!
Address: Hagenstra√üe 57, Berlin Lichtenberg (next to U+S station Lichtenberg)
